r.d: Text_LanguageDetect can identify 52 human languages from text samples and return confidence scores for each.
r.n: * Added unicode block range identification * unicode block ranges used to optimize language detection by pre-selecting which known language trigram profiles in the database to attempt comparison with * Added several utf8/unicode utility functions * new Parser class for building data profiles from text samples * Fix: mb_convert_encoding() now used correctly * Fix: basic case-folding for Cyrillic alphabet implemented
